channel.title: Error with 508 client help please?
channel.description:
When i run run.bat file i get this error : Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . Please Help me. Client 508
any got any adivce?

item.title: Error with 508 client help please?
item.dc:creator: @XxJtxX XxJtxX
item.description:
@XxJtxX wrote:

Did you start the server before you ran the client?

Read full topic

item.title: Error with 508 client help please?
item.dc:creator: @Chris_da_god_real Chris da god real
item.description:
@Chris_da_god_real wrote:

When i run run.bat file i get this error :
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .
Please Help me.
Client 508

any got any adivce?
